channel.title: Comments on: Good service deserves credit

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Unfortunately not, I guess you're too far out in the sticks for them to deliver to.<br /><br />M</p>
item.content:encoded:
Unfortunately not, I guess you’re too far out in the sticks for them to deliver to.

M

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GK5/$File/huh.gif"</a> /> Our nearest Waitrose is Bury or Sudbury!! Do you think they would deliver here (as I would love to buy some of their products)?<br/><br /><br/><br />See you at the weekend</p>
item.content:encoded:
http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GK5/$File/huh.gif“ /> Our nearest Waitrose is Bury or Sudbury!! Do you think they would deliver here (as I would love to buy some of their products)?

See you at the weekend

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Well what can I say, everyone has their vices <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Well what can I say, everyone has their vices http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>Let me get this straight, you stay at the pub for 4 hours and you still need to bring beer home.<br/><br />Is Bill staying with you? <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
Let me get this straight, you stay at the pub for 4 hours and you still need to bring beer home.

Is Bill staying with you? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLS/$File/biggrin.gif“ />
